code: import{useEffect}from"react";import useFetch from"../../../hooks/useFetch";var useLoadVideos=function useLoadVideos(_ref){var pageIndex=_ref.pageIndex;var path='api/v1/videos';var _useFetch=useFetch({path:path,method:'GET'}),data=_useFetch.data,isLoading=_useFetch.isLoading,error=_useFetch.error,total=_useFetch.total,fetchApi=_useFetch.fetchApi;var parsedData=data==null?[]:data.map(function(raw_video){return{id:raw_video.id,youtubeUrl:raw_video.youtube_url,youtubeId:raw_video.youtube_id,sharedBy:raw_video.sharer_email,upvoteCount:raw_video.upvote_count,downvoteCount:raw_video.downvote_count,description:raw_video.description,title:raw_video.title,createdAt:raw_video.created_at,updatedAt:raw_video.updated_at};});useEffect(function(){fetchApi({page:pageIndex});},[pageIndex]);return{data:parsedData,isLoading:isLoading,error:error,total:total,fetchVideos:fetchApi};};export default useLoadVideos;
